response_text: Yes ‚Äî there are Windows-compatible tools that provide live translation during Google Meet or other video calls. Options range from built-in features to third-party apps that run during your meetings:  ‚úÖ Built-in (no extra app)  Google Meet Translated Captions / Speech Translation ‚Äì Meet can show live translated captions directly in the app for supported languages if your plan supports it. This shows translated subtitles in real time. Google Help+1 [https://support.google.com/meet/answer/10964115?co=GENIE.Platform%3DDesktop&hl=en-IE]  üîß Windows apps / third-party tools for live translation  These run alongside or integrate with your meeting software:  1. TransGull  Windows app that enables real-time interpretation for Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet. transgull.com [https://transgull.com/online-meeting-translation]  2. JotMe (desktop app + Chrome extension)  Live translation and transcription in meetings (Google Meet, Zoom, Teams). Works on Windows via browser or its app. JotMe [https://www.jotme.io/]  3. Talo AI  AI interpreter that integrates with Google Meet, Teams, Zoom for real-time conversation translation (voice/text). Talo [https://taloai.com/]  4. Wordly AI Translation Agent  Joins meetings as a bot to provide live captions and translation in multiple languages. Wordly [https://www.wordly.ai/ai-translation-agent]  5. Transync AI  Platform-independent real-time meeting captions and voice translation that works with Meet/Zoom/Teams. ÂêåË®ÄÁøªËØë [https://www.transyncai.com/tools/live-meeting-translation/]  üß† Additional tools (more transcription-focused)  Tactiq ‚Äì real-time transcription with post-meeting translations (via Chrome extension). Tactiq [https://tactiq.io/]  ü™ü OS-level live translation (Windows 11+, Copilot+ PCs)  Windows Live Captions can translate system audio in real time across apps (including meeting audio), showing live translated captions on screen. Microsoft Support [https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/use-live-captions-to-better-understand-audio-b52da59c-14b8-4031-aeeb-f6a47e6055df]  Note: Some built-in platform features (Meet/Zoom) may be limited by account type or plan. Google Help [https://support.google.com/meet/answer/10964115?co=GENIE.Platform%3DDesktop&hl=en-IE]  If you want the simplest connector for Google Meet specifically, JotMe or TransGull are often recommended as Windows solutions that run alongside your meetings.
